name: idk what to call this game so let's just call it bat i think
name_original: idk what to call this game so let's just call it bat i think
description:
uploaded a game i made a while back. another platformer game where you can have infinite jumps.

i really dont know what im making lol.

i cant even think of a better name for my game :sad: 

also if the game is brutally hard for you, check out the pause menu!

made with Godot Engine.
